title: Fmr. Def. Sec. Bob Gates talks Vladimir Putin, Spies in America, and College Sports
description: In a special, extended interview, Former Defense Secretary Bob Gates talks about his advice to President Trump, what Vladimir Putin really wants, and his reaction to the president's speech in front of the Boy Scouts.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
